snippet: The Nissan Altima is now the second-best-selling passenger car in the country. The company has redesigned the sedan for 2013, and although the new car drives beautifully, Nissan has played it safe.
abstract: Behind the Wheel column review of the 2013 Nissan Altima.
lead_paragraph: The Nissan Altima is now the second-best-selling passenger car in the country. The company has redesigned the sedan for 2013, and although the new car drives beautifully, Nissan has played it safe.

headline.print_headline: Two New Heavyweights in the Midsize Ring: Altima: Sailing Into the Mainstream
headline.kicker: Behind the Wheel | 2013 Nissan Altima and Honda Accord
